resources.string: The Crohn\'s & Colitis Foundationâ€™s mission: To cure Crohn\'s disease and ulcerative colitis, and to improve the quality of life of children and adults affected by these diseases.
Available for iOS and Android devices, this app will house studies conducted by FDA and other institutions, enabling researchers to engage more directly with people to gather data via questionnaires.

You have chosen to delete your FMS iBD Account. This will result in automatic withdrawal from all studies.\n\nBelow is a list of studies that you are a part of and information on how your response data will be handled with each after you withdraw. Please review and confirm.
Are you sure you wish to permanently delete your FDA Health Studies Gateway app account? You will need to register again if you wish to join a study.
It\'s been a while since you visited the FDA MyStudies app. Please consider continuing your participation in any studies in which you\'re enrolled.
